mapper.update:
update box_office
movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
movie_name = #{movieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_info = #{boxInfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
release_day = #{releaseDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum_box_info = #{sumBoxInfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sum_day = #{sumDay,jdbcType=DATE},
sum_box_info_unit = #{sumBoxInfoUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_info_unit = #{boxInfoUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update box_office set movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movie_name = #{movieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, box_info = #{boxInfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, release_day = #{releaseDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum_box_info = #{sumBoxInfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sum_day = #{sumDay,jdbcType=DATE}, sum_box_info_unit = #{sumBoxInfoUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, box_info_unit = #{boxInfoUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from box_office where sum_day = #{sumDay} and movie_id = #{movieId};
select * from box_office where sum_day between #{startDay} and #{endDay} and movie_id = #{movieId}
